schema.description: 可用性监控任务ID。N的取值范围：1~20。

Message.example: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.

Success.description:
操作是否成功。取值：

- true：成功。

- false：失败。

403.errorMessage: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.

404.errorMessage: The specified resource is not found.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

title: 启用指定可用性监控任务
summary: 调用EnableHostAvailability接口启用指定可用性监控任务。
